title: Physics and Stephen Hawking - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 7/6/21
itunes:title: Physics and Stephen Hawking - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 7/6/21
description:
George Noory and theoretical physicist Dr. Leonard Mlodinow recall his career working with physicist Stephen Hawking, his thoughts on creation of life in the universe and the possibility of a multiverse, and what discoveries physics may uncover in the future.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
